flowchart
Class LabelDimension

java.lang.Object
  flowchart.LabelDimension
public class LabelDimension
extends java.lang.Object

A utility class for calculating the height and width of a label in HTML format. The dimension size will be utilized to calculate the size of rectangles (processings) and diamonds (conditions) in a flowchart.

Version:
1.00 (Last update: June 8, 2008)
Author:
Dr. Wen-jun LI, Da LUO

          Embedded testing, since I am not sure whether the size calculation based on JLabel's getPreferredSize() can work.

main

public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
Embedded testing, since I am not sure whether the size calculation based on JLabel's getPreferredSize() can work. The result is that it DOES work !

Parameters:
args - No command line parameters are used.
